item.description:
I want to kick off my 26th birthday weekend with karaoke night at the Penalty Box. Please join me to celebrate, and I expect lots of song dedications! ;-) Arrive early if you want to make sure you have the opportunity to sing your song.

Everyone is welcomed, whether it's your first meetup or your 100th!

For information about the bar, visit http://www.penaltyboxri.com/
item.how_to_find_us: it's a pretty small bar... you should be able to find me easily (look at my picture) or message me for my cell
item.name: Karaoke @ Penalty Box [Malyna's Birthday]
